CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [8][9][10][11] In recent efforts to develop high performance conjugated polymers , building blocks have been carefully designed for the conjugated polymers to have adequate energy levels , broad light absorption and strong self - assembly for use in BHJ PSC.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Conjugated polymers
2. Building blocks
3. BHJ PSC (Bulk Heterojunction Polymer Solar Cells)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. Conjugated polymers
2. Building blocks

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Conjugated polymers |
| Building blocks |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [8][9][10][11] In recent efforts to develop high performance conjugated polymers , building blocks have been carefully designed for the conjugated polymers to have adequate energy levels , broad light absorption and strong self - assembly for use in BHJ PSC.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Energy levels: This refers to the energy levels of the conjugated polymers, which are important for their performance in BHJ PSCs.
2. Light absorption: This refers to the ability of the conjugated polymers to absorb light, which is an important property for their use in solar cells.
3. Self-assembly: This refers to the ability of the conjugated polymers to assemble themselves into a desired structure or pattern, which is important for their use in BHJ PSCs.

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. Energy levels
2. Light absorption
3. Self-assembly
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties:

1. Energy levels: This refers to the energy levels of the conjugated polymers, which are important for their performance in BHJ PSCs. (Material Property: Energy level)
2. Light absorption: This refers to the ability of the conjugated polymers to absorb light, which is an important property for their use in solar cells. (Material Property: Light absorption)

So, the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties are:

1. Energy levels
2. Light absorption

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Energy levels |
| Light absorption |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [8][9][10][11] In recent efforts to develop high performance conjugated polymers , building blocks have been carefully designed for the conjugated polymers to have adequate energy levels , broad light absorption and strong self - assembly for use in BHJ PSC.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Energy levels: The paragraph mentions "adequate energy levels" of the conjugated polymers, which refers to the energy levels of the molecules.
2. Light absorption: The paragraph states that the conjugated polymers have "broad light absorption," which refers to the ability of the molecules to absorb light across a wide range of wavelengths.
3. Self-assembly: The paragraph mentions "strong self-assembly" of the conjugated polymers, which refers to the ability of the molecules to organize themselves into a specific structure or pattern without the need for external direction.

Therefore, the three "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. Energy levels
2. Light absorption
3. Self-assembly
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Energy levels: The paragraph mentions "adequate energy levels" of the conjugated polymers, which refers to the energy levels of the molecules.

Therefore, the only entity that refers to the value of material properties in the given paragraph is:

1. Energy levels

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| adequate energy levels |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
